name: Valence (Spinfoam Games)
description:
Valence is an early prototype for a rolling-ball adventure game.

Currently there are just 10 simple tutorial-style levels designed to provide an overview of how to play and the sorts of obstacles that you would expect to encounter throughout the game.

The levels available in this version can be completed in about 10 minutes, but will probably take a bit longer if you are playing through for the first time.

Supporting Development

If you find the idea of Valence (or any of the experimental releases from Spinfoam Games) interesting and you want to support and encourage its development there are several things you can do (all of which are enormously appreciated)!

  • Follow Valence and Spinfoam Games here on Itch.io
  • Check out Spinfoam Games Patreon page and considered becoming a patron (there are no tiers -- any level of support is hugely helpful)
  • Consider making a donation when you download Valence or any other Spinfoam Games releases
Running the Game

After downloading you will need to unzip `valence-win64.zip` and run `Valence2020.exe`.

Press `ESC` while playing to pause the game and access the menu.
